sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Make "sn_install_base_item" table extendable. It will run at upgrade time.</description>
        <name>"sn_install_base_item" extendable</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (!GlidePluginManager.isUpgradeSystemBusy()) {
        return;
    }
    var sysDBObjectGr = new GlideRecord("sys_db_object");
    if (!sysDBObjectGr.get("name", "sn_install_base_item"))
        return;
    sysDBObjectGr.setValue("is_extendable", true);
    sysDBObjectGr.update();

})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-01-31 07:20:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3726236753a200103a2eddeeff7b12cd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>"sn_install_base_item" extendable</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Base Entities" source="com.snc.cs_base">4f2cce6b47664210cd4e1ce4316d43a4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3726236753a200103a2eddeeff7b12cd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-01-31 18:22:49</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
